text: Tomara rasulera ahbanake tomadera eke aparera ahbanera mata ganya kara na; tomadera madhye yara eke aparake arala kare alaksye sare pare allahâ€Œ to taderake janena [1]. Kaje'i yara tamra adesera birud'dhacarana kare tara satarka hoka ye, biparyaya tadera upara apatita habe athaba apatita habe tadera upara yantranadayaka sasti
